revision.comment: Central Nahuatl: correct whitespace of section 0
revision.text: ==Central Nahuatl== ===Alternative forms=== * {{sense|Cholula}} {{l|nhn|xihtli}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nhn|/ˈʃiːktɬi/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nhn|noun}} # {{lb|nhn|Milpa Alta}} [[navel|Navel]] [[Category:Amecameca Central Nahuatl]] [[Category:Milpa Alta Central Nahuatl]] {{c|nhn|Body parts}} ---- ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|nci|azc-nah-pro}}, from {{inh|nci|azc-pro|*siku}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|/ˈʃiːkt͡ɬi/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nci|noun|head=xictli}} # [[navel]] #* '''1571''', [[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]], ''[[w:Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana|Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana]]'', f. 159r. col. 1. #*: '''xictli'''. ombligo, o bruxula para tirar derecho. #*: '''xictli'''. navel; or peephole. # [[umbilical cord]] ====Derived terms==== * {{l|nci|axictli}} <!---whirlpool: ātl + xīctli---> ===References=== * “[https://web.archive.org/web/20161203034759/http://whp.uoregon.edu/dictionaries/nahuatl/index.lasso xictli]” in the ''Nahuatl Dictionary'', University of Oregon, 2011.
